title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 89.15 - Canadian and British insurer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 89.15 - Canadian and British insurer

State Regulations
(a) In the case of a United States branch of a Canadian or British insurer, the annual audited financial report shall be the annual statement of total business on the form filed by the insurer with its supervision authority duly audited by an independent chartered accountant. (b) For each insurer described in subdivision (a) of this section, the letter required in section
89.4
(b) of this Part shall state that the CPA is aware of the requirements relating to the annual audited financial report filed with the superintendent pursuant to section
89.3
of this Part and shall affirm that the opinion expressed is in conformity with those requirements. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
89.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
